app.word: Shows a message in the chat window when users enter and leave the room
When the user has been inactive for this amount of time, they will be automatically kicked from the room
Show chat history upon joining a room
The user will be prompted to agree to the rules before being allowed to join the room
Optionally specify a time period that chat will be available
The chat room is not presently available
You must supply a license key in order to enable the chat room
Your license does not include access to the chat room
Your group does not have permission to access the chat room
You do not have permission to access the chat room
You do not have permission to ban users in chat
There was an error joining the chat room. Please try again or contact us.
The chat room is currently offline but will be back at %s.
The chat room is currently offline based upon the ACP configuration available at Community -> Chat -> Settings
You have left the chat room
The license key used was invalid, or is not correctly associated with a chat account.
No username was supplied to connect to the chat room. Please contact technical support for assistance.
No room number was supplied to connect to the chat room. Please contact technical support for assistance.
The room id supplied is invalid. Please contact technical support for assistance.
The license key used was invalid, or is not correctly associated with a chat account. Please contact technical support for assistance.
The server the chat room was hosted on is no longer online. Please wait a few moments and try again or contact technical support for assistance.
The server the chat room was hosted on is no longer online. Please wait a few moments and try again or contact technical support for assistance.
The chat server is offline. Please contact technical support for assistance.
The chat room limit has been reached. You will not be able to join the chat room until some users first leave.
Your license does not include Chat or has expired. Please contact customer services for assistance.
Your server was unable to communicate with our chat servers. Please contact technical support for assistance.
The license key used was invalid, or is not correctly associated with a chat account. Please contact technical support for assistance.
No username was supplied to connect to the chat room. Please contact technical support for assistance.
The room ID supplied was invalid. Please wait a few moments and try again or contact technical support for assistance.
The chat room key has expired. Please wait a few moments and try again or contact technical support for assistance.
The license key did not match the key for the chat room. Please wait a few moments and try again or contact technical support for assistance.
Show the users currently in the chat room
There are no users currently in the chat room
You can't start a private chat with yourself!
You have been kicked from the chatroom.
